thread.title: I'm A Celebrity? Greggs? Where next for Wayne Shaw, the disgraced pie-eating Sutton United goalkeeper?
thread.title_full: I'm A Celebrity? Greggs? Where next for Wayne Shaw, the disgraced pie-eating Sutton United goalkeeper?

author: Row Zed
title: I'm A Celebrity? Greggs? Where next for Wayne Shaw, the disgraced pie-eating Sutton United goalkeeper?
text:
Poor Wayne Shaw . 
All the Sutton United reserve keeper did was eat and pie and now he's lost his job. 
Admittedly, that pie-eating incident may have been a breach of FA Betting Regulations and after the footballing governing body opened an investigation into the keeper, he resigned from the non-league club . 
But what next for the Big Man? Here are some suggestions on where he could go next after leaving Sutton... Read More This isn't the first time Wayne Shaw has left Sutton United in disgrace as 'roly poly' keeper resigns I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here 
I was going to suggest The Jump here but I think the sheer logistics of that happening are non-existent. (Photo: Rex) The face of Greggs 
Shaw has already been offered a job at Morrisons as a 'pie taster' but imagine seeing that chirpy face outside Greggs, you'd never not pop in for a steak bake slice. (Photo: Birmingham Mail) 
Let's face it, we'd all watch it. Read More
